text:
To begin, you will need to
find a map you want to install.
There are a variety of different maps
you can find online
on websites such as CurseForge,
Planet Minecraft, and MinecraftMaps.com.
You can find the links to these sites
in the description below.
Some maps come in multiple versions.

If you have the choice to
choose between versions,

go ahead and select
the version you prefer.
If not, then you'll have to play the map
in the version specified.
After downloading the map of your choice,

drag the downloaded zip
file onto your desktop.

Next, you'll need to extract
it into a folder using WinRAR

or any other extractor tool
you have on your computer.

After doing so, a new folder
should appear on your desktop.
Next, you'll need to open the file,
and you'll find a folder with the name
of the Minecraft map you downloaded.
Double-click and open this file.
You should be able to see folders
such as advancements, data, or datapacks.
These folders are the content
of the Minecraft map you have downloaded.
Once you see those files,
click the left arrow to go back.
Then drag this folder onto the desktop.

You can then go ahead and get
rid of all the other files

after doing this, as you'll
only need this folder.
Now go over to the search bar
on the bottom left of your desktop
and type in "run"
then hit enter.
Then type in "%appdata%" and hit enter.

Find the folder labeled as
".minecraft," then open it.
Now you'll need to find the saves folder
and open that.

This folder includes
all the Minecraft worlds
you currently have in-game.

If you haven't started
any Minecraft worlds,
then this folder will be empty.

Now drag and drop the
Minecraft map into this folder.
After doing so, you can now go ahead
and open the Minecraft launcher.

Make sure to launch the
game in the same version
as the Minecraft map you downloaded
so that there aren't any complications

or missing items and blocks
upon joining the world.
After launching the game,
go ahead and click on "Singleplayer."
And here's where you'll find
your newly installed Minecraft map.
